message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've already priced it lower than I'd like. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $115.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $100 is a more reasonable price. Can you meet me at $100?
